AbilityScoreFeature.Name: Keen Mind
AbilityScoreFeature.Text: You have a mind that can track time, direction, and detail with uncanny precision. You gain the following benefits. • Increase your Intelligence score by 1, to a maximum of 20. • You always know which way is north. • You always know the number of hours left before the next sunrise or sunset. • You can accurately recall anything you have seen or heard within the past month.
